name: Kittens Among A Dark Energy
description:
Made For: "DEVCOM5" GAME-JAM   by twitch.tv/coder2k

Topic: "LIGHT  AND DARKNESS"

Development Time Required (Live on Twitch):   10hrs40min / 28hrs

Developed by:   https://twitch.tv/mostwanted38

Game Engine: Unity 2021.1.11f1

(Game Title Is "Work In Progress")

Game Description:

Inside the Depth of the   universe where light and darkness exist side by side  is a new species born:  The Blue Cats!  They seem to be on the light side and love breaking things.  They dont  like the darkness at all.   So they brought their favorite toy: A blue energetic ball to crush everything in their way! It is powered by the light!

The Goal:

Move your UFO and  redirect the ball to eliminate   ALL  of the DARKNESS (Bricks) in the level.  Cats love the light! Dont destroy the LIGHT (Bricks)!  This will  reduce your own energy! Once you reach 0, you're dead!  Also avoid touching the energy field at the bottom. Then you'll lose half your energy!

The Controls:

A-D or ArrowLeft/Right: Move Horizontal 

Spacebar: Launch the ball from the ship

Shift: Redirect  the Ball back to the ship
